channel.title: Need help with people connecting to my server!
channel.description: For some reason people can't connect to my server. I edited the client files and changed the IP to my no-ip address (I also tried a static IP that I port forwarded to) and they still can't connect. I also compiled and sent them the new client, but no luck. Am I doing this right? Can someone add me on MSN and help me using Team viewer???

item.title: Need help with people connecting to my server!
